actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to clarify the intent of Congress in connection with certain school grant indemnity land statutes and the Taylor Grazing Act.

summary.text: Construes the Taylor Grazing Act to mean that no Federal authority has the power to disapprove, on a comparative value or any other basis, a State's selection of indemnity lands in substitute for such State's lost school sections.

titles.title: A bill to clarify the intent of Congress in connection with certain school grant indemnity land statutes and the Taylor Grazing Act.
